message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper describes a method for document classification and filtering, which is a common task in information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of a neural network for classification, which falls under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper involves feature selection, which is a common technique in natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the paper mentions the optimization of the length of the feature vector, which is a common optimization problem in neural networks (cs.NE).
